MIN_KYC_ACCOUNT_OPENED.EMAIL_SUBJECT: AU Small Finance Bank Account details
MIN_KYC_ACCOUNT_OPENED.EMAIL_BODY:
Dear $cust_name$,

AU Namaskar,

Thank you for selecting AU Small Finance Bank as your bank of choice.

Please find enclosed the details shared and verified by you during the account opening process. We request your kind perusal of the shared details and in case of any discrepancy, we request you to immediately get in touch with your nearest AU Small Finance Bank branch or our representative who assisted you in the on-boarding process.

The enclosed document is a password protected PDF document and the password is the combination of your first name (in capital letters) and your date of birth (in DDMMYYYY format).
For example, if your account name is RAVI VERMA and DOB is 13-01-1992, then your password will be RAVI13011992.
Please note: The password is case-sensitive, hence request you to ensure that the details of the first name are mentioned in capital letters.

We would be delighted to offer our services to your near and dear ones as well. Should you be interested, you may please leave the contact details of your references in the form available in the following link and we?ll get in touch with them on your behalf.

Click here to refer your friends and family !!

For any further assistance, request you to visit your nearest AU Small Finance Bank branch or get in touch with our Customer Care at 1800 1200 1200.

We assure you of our best services always.

Note -Revised Schedule of Charges w.e.f. 1st September 2018 for new accounts & w.e.f. 1st October 2018 for existing accounts(Opened till 31st August?18), for more details please refer AU Bank`s website at below link.

https://www.aubank.in/schedule-charges

Warm Regards,
AU SMALL FINANCE BANK LTD.


-- Please do not reply to this mail as this is an auto-generated email --


DISCLAIMER: This e-mail message and any attachment thereto contains confidential, proprietary and legally privileged information. It is for the exclusive use of the addressee.
If you are not the addressee please note that any distribution, copying or use of this communication or the information in it is prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify us,
preferably by e-mail, and do not read, copy or disclose the contents of this message to anyone and permanently delete this message and all attachments, if any, from your system.
The recipient must note and understand that any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender and no binding nature of the message shall be implied or assumed
unless the sender does so expressly with due authority of AU Small Finance Bank Limited. Before opening and accessing the attachment, if any, please check and scan for virus.
